long_description: The Inov8 F-Lite 240 Fitness Shoes outfit you for intense training sessions, from rope climbs and weight lifting to interval training and running. 6mm heel-to-toe drop positions this shoe as a transition between a barefoot style and a traditional running shoe. Highly breathable uppers feature thermoplastic urethane overlays for support. Polyester mesh linings wick moisture away from feet and dry quickly for comfort. Injected EVA midsoles cushion each step, and offer lightweight support. Rope-Tec(TM) technology ensures the shoes will stand up to abrasion and friction from ascending and descending ropes. Rubber outsoles on the Inov8 F-Lite 240 shoes offer a sure grip on indoor and outdoor surfaces.
short_description: The Inov8 F-Lite 240 Fitness Shoes outfit you for intense training sessions, from rope climbs and weight lifting to interval training and running.
